channel.title: Nissan
channel.description:
All you nissan finatics from america, everyone can reply But the question..?
-Has any of you ever heard of a 1986 Nissan D20?-
-And the 3.0 liter crate motor that was made for it-
"The answer" [spoiler]If you said there was no such truck ever, I will slap the shit out of you, I drive one[/spoiler]
"The answer about the engine" [spoiler]Now me personally I also have one that I dropped in my nissan, Idk if it was made for this truck, So an answer would be nice..[/spoiler]
The 3.0 liter puts out around 188 hp @ 5200rpm, and gets around 20-25 mpg, could you answer the engine cause I really need it lol
COME TO MOPAR FOR ENGINE HELP, The first question was just for fun but I really need to know about the second

item.title: Nissan
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

no such thing as d20, either 720 or d21 aka nissan hardbody. post your vin number or decode your vin number

Read full topic

item.title: Nissan
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“RUNE-PK, post:18, topic:546504”][quote author=Mikeyzzz link=topic=665404.msg4448467#msg4448467 date=1410079568]

I still stand firmly on the grounds that there was no such truck ever,

If you trying to be funny its not working, and I do believe there is supposed to be a period at the end of a sentence.
[/quote]no the comma was there for you to carry on my sentence, thanks for that.

No, I will not carry on your sentence. that is your job… Lol[/quote]K, your truck doesn’t exist.

/thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Nissan
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“RUNE-PK, post:11, topic:546504”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=665404.msg4448300#msg4448300 date=1410024506]
Please mind Ruby, he’s gay.

[hr]

OP: I have a friend that actually owns one of these, but what is your question exactly? If you’re asking about motor swaps it really doesn’t matter, as long as the tranny bolts up and the alternator, radiator, A/C and all of those components are compatible, you’re good to go.
[/quote]

He’s cool lol[/quote]

You completely averted the 2nd half of my message…

Read full topic
